section2.p: Buddycloud is designed around replaceable XMPP server components. Each component offers a discrete set of services, and communicated with other components using XEP-0114 component connections. For example, a media hosting is delivered via a separate XMPP component that communicates with the local and remote Buddycloud server.

Other components offer services offer services like Buddycloud channel crawling and content search, channel recommendations, an HTTP API and tailored push notification services. Additional services are covered by separate XEPs.
